title: 1 Bedroom Units available now!!
posting_body: Our community blends together comfort and a convenient location.

We are situated near the many shopping, dining, and entertainment options the area has to offer, including Highland Mall, The Domain, H-E-B, Whole Foods Market, Target, La Marea Restaurant & Seafood, and Buffalo Wild Wings.

The Hedge is located in north central Austin and near many area schools and employers, such as Graham Elementary School, Dobie Middle School, Northeast Early College High School, The University of Texas at Austin, Austin Community College, Facebook, Amazon, HomeAway, and Indeed - Austin Domain Tower Office.
With Highway 183 and Interstate 35 nearby, you'll enjoy convenient access to anywhere in the area.
Come check out Austins newest place to call home!
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
